001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.providers;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberConfiguration;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint;
006import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
007
008import java.io.*;
009import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
010
011public class FilePersistentSubscriberCheckpoint
012        implements PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint {
013    private final Logger logger;
014    private String name;
015    private RandomAccessFile checkpointFile;
016    private long revision;
017
018    public FilePersistentSubscriberCheckpoint(Logger logger) {
019        this.logger = logger;
020    }
021
022    @Override
023    public void init(PersistentSubscriberConfiguration configuration) throws IOException {
024        name = configuration.getName();
025        File file = new File(configuration.getString("checkpoint").orElseThrow(Configuration.missing("checkpoint"))).getAbsoluteFile();
026        boolean exists = file.exists();
027
028        if (!file.getParentFile().mkdirs()) {
029            logger.error("Could not create directories for {}", file);
030        }
031        checkpointFile = new RandomAccessFile(file, "rwd");
032
033        if (exists && checkpointFile.length() > 0) {
034            byte[] bytes = new byte[(int) checkpointFile.length()];
035            checkpointFile.read(bytes);
036            revision = Long.parseLong(new String(bytes, StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
037            logger.info("Loading existing checkpoint {} for '{}': {}", file.toString(), name);
038        } else {
039            logger.info("Creating new checkpoint {} for '{}", file.toString(), name);
040        }
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public long getCheckpoint() throws IOException {
045        return revision;
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public void setCheckpoint(long revision) throws IOException {
050
051        checkpointFile.seek(0);
052        checkpointFile.write(Long.toString(revision).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
053        this.revision = revision;
054        logger.debug("Checkpoint {} for {}", revision, name);
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    public void close() throws IOException {
059        checkpointFile.close();
060    }
061}
